General.Name: Vacasa Inc
General.Description: Vacasa, Inc. operates a vertically integrated vacation rental management platform in the United States, Belize, Canada, Costa Rica, and Mexico. It enables guests to search, discover, and book properties on Vacasa.com and Guest App. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Portland, Oregon. As of April 30, 2025, Vacasa, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Casago International LLC.
General.Address: 850 NW 13th Avenue, Portland, OR, United States, 97209
